property.name: hive.metastore.warehouse.dir
property.description: URI of the default location for tables in the default catalog and database.

property.name: datanucleus.schema.autoCreateAll
property.description:
Creates necessary schema on a startup if one does not exist. Set this to false, after creating it once.
datanucleus.schema.autoCreateAll is disabled if hive.metastore.schema.verification is true. Default: true

property.name: hive.metastore.schema.verification
property.description:
Enforce metastore schema version consistency. True: Verify that version information stored in metastore matches with one from Hive jars. Also disable automatic schema migration attempt (see datanucleus.autoCreateSchema and datanucleus.schema.autoCreateAll). Users are required to manually migrate schema after Hive upgrade which ensures proper metastore schema migration. False: Warn if the version information stored in metastore doesn't match with one from Hive jars.
For more information, see Metastore Schema Consistency and Upgrades. Default: false

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: JDBC connect string for a JDBC metastore. Default: jdbc:derby:;databaseName=metastore_db;create=true

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Driver class name for a JDBC metastore. Default: org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Username to use against metastore database. Default: APP

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: Password to use against metastore database. Default: mine

property.name: hive.metastore.rawstore.impl
property.description: As of Hive 3.0 there are two implementations. The default implementation (org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.ObjectStore) queries the database directly. HIVE-16520 introduced a new CachedStore (full class name is org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.cache.CachedStore) that caches retrieved objects in memory on the Metastore.

property.name: hive.metastore.metrics.enabled
property.description: Enable metrics on the Hive Metastore Service. (For other metastore configuration properties, see the Metastore and Hive Metastore Security sections.) Default: false
